channel.title: Dueling
channel.description: is there any way when you win a duel instead the person you killed the items he staked are dropped on the ground when he loses his stake :)[br][size=1]Posted on: July 04, 2007, 10:41:46 AM[/size][hr]and also how to add dueling would be nice, lol

item.title: Dueling
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

ApplyDead method is called when a player dies which calls a bunch of other methods to drop items on floor

so just add a check near ApplyDead which can be found inside process method

	//If killed apply dead
	if (IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1) {
		ApplyDead();
	}

so u already i guess have some boolean like IsDuel if you don’t you would have to add one

so your process would look like this

	if (IsDead == true && InDuel == false && NewHP <= 1 ) {
		ApplyDead();
	}

it won’t work if you don’t set InDuel = True; when a duel starts…
when a duel ends set IsDead/HP back to normal and IsDuel to false

also ApplyDead is called each time at Posion method if you are posioned in a duel checks if the player you attack is dead than drops items so add a InDuel check there too

adding full dueling it self I don’t know how to do would require alot of work there.

Read full topic
